Clean contempory lines, coupled with simplicity by design, the Markilux 970 is the perfect complement to any new architecture or renovation. Recessed into a niche, mounted to the façade or soffit, the 970 shallow cassette profile allows the end user to shade any area with minimum visual aesthetic impact. With an overall cassette height of only 5 ½” and maximum width and projection of 16’ 5” X 11’6”, it is truly compact although with very large results.
In addition to its minimalistic profile, the Markilux 970 has special features which elevates it into a class of its own. This awning offers an interchangeable panel for the front profile, which is available in the subtle neutral colors or modern contrasting colors. The Markilux 970 is also equipped with LED spotlights, which can illuminate any outdoor living space. The 970 is also equipped with a tilt device which allows for a variable pitch between 5 to 30 degrees angle. To ensure that rain water runs off the awning cover the 970 requires a minimum pitch of 15 degrees.
The markilux 970 is available in the following Lounge colors: Off-white textured finish, Stone Grey Metallic, Anthracite Metallic, Havana Brown textured finish, Traffic White and Metallic Aluminum. Markilux also come with an extensive line of polyester fabrics which are durable and self-cleaning. This innovative system is available either with detachable manual crank or a radio remote controlled motor.
